word:
But let my brethren consider, is this a sanctified union? I know that it is not. The power possessed over minds leads you to look to and trust in each other rather than to trust in the living God. It leads you to consult with each other when you should be on your knees pleading with God, the mighty Counsellor. It leads you to strengthen each other to find things you 
                                                                           360
can question and construe in a way to encourage your unbelief. What one man would not think of by himself, another will supply with his suggestions.
